actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Jeffords under authority of the order of the Senate of 10/17/2002 without amendment. With written report No. 107-329.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 746.

official_title: A bill to authorize the project for environmental restoration, Pine Flat Dam, Fresno County, California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to carry out a specified environmental restoration project at Pine Flat Dam, Fresno County, California.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the project for environmental restoration, Pine Flat Dam, Fresno County, California.
